text: our world has many

for a

collect
90% of all the waste that's actually

independently picking W on the streets

kosas kosas are C built from wood or

Brazil much like graffiti and street art
and this is how I first met these
marginalized

activist and my art is social

giving voice to the

cause it became more appealing which

over 200 kosas in many cities and be

peep

because of their pimped kosas they are
able to fight back Prejudice increase
their income and their interaction with
Society so now I'd like to challenge you
to start looking at and acknowledge the
katoris and other invisible superheroes
from your city try to see the world as
one without boundaries or Frontiers
believe it or not there are over 20
million catadores
worldwide so next time you see one
